docs.lead_paragraph: The R. M. Steamship Europa, with three days' after news from Eurupe, is now in her eleventh day cut from Liverpool, due at Halifax. She had not been signaled at midnight.
docs.snippet: The R. M. Steamship Europa, with three days' after news from Eurupe, is now in her eleventh day cut from Liverpool, due at Halifax. She had not been signaled at midnight.

docs.lead_paragraph: QUARANTINE MATTERS.-There was no fresh cases of disease at Quarantine yesterday, inside or outside of the walls, and the surviving patients from the Illinois were doing well There was one exoeption only, to this, who would probably die, making six deaths out of the whole number landed from that steamer.
docs.snippet: QUARANTINE MATTERS.-There was no fresh cases of disease at Quarantine yesterday, inside or outside of the walls, and the surviving patients from the Illinois were doing well There was one exoeption only, to this, who would probably die, making six...

docs.lead_paragraph: The official report from Quarantine, yesterday, was very favorable as respects the condition of the yellow-fever patients from the steamer Illinois. With the exception of one case which may prove fatal, all the remaining cases were improving, and would recover.
docs.snippet: The official report from Quarantine, yesterday, was very favorable as respects the condition of the yellow-fever patients from the steamer Illinois. With the exception of one case which may prove fatal, all the remaining cases were improving, and...

docs.lead_paragraph: Probationers Discharged from the Illinois--Release of the Sail--Beat Party--That Doctor and the Gold--Headed Came--Correction--Death of a California Lady--Heroic Self--Denial--No New Cases or Fever--Position of the Illinois. Yesterday was a day of rejoining among the imprisoned at Old Quarantine, not only to those restrained for a season as a precautionary measure against the spread of disease, but to those. Also, who unluckily fell under the Doctor's displeasure for violating the Quarantine limits.

headline.main: NEWS FROM EUROPE.; Arrival of the Arange and Kangaroo. Probability of Another Attempt This Year to Lay the Submarine Cable. ENCOURAGING PROSPECTS OF SUCCESS. Interesting Accounts from India.

docs.lead_paragraph: The U. S. Mail Steamer Arago, Capt. LINES, arrived here yesterday morning from Havre and Southampton with advice to Aug 26. The Arago brings 210 passengers, most of them first class, the usual mails, $100,000 in Specie and 400 tons Merchandise.
docs.snippet: The U. S. Mail Steamer Arago, Capt. LINES, arrived here yesterday morning from Havre and Southampton with advice to Aug 26. The Arago brings 210 passengers, most of them first class, the usual mails, $100,000 in Specie and 400 tons Merchandise.

docs.lead_paragraph: The unusual course pursued at Quarantine in the case of the steamer Illinois and her passengers, has excited a natural anxiety in the public mind, and has suggested a query as to the nature of the disease which has rendered it necessary, in the opinion of the Health Officer, to detain her 600 passengers within the Quarantine limits for so long a time, and to send the steamer to the lower anchorage.
